feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.4.2
entry.content:
FIX

  • Force a credential check if the user has a username and password set. (closes #179)

What's Changed

  • Check credentials by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/182

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.4.1...v5.4.2

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.5.0
entry.content:
NEW

  • You can now interact with your NUT servers directly via terminal access

FIX

  • Fix for api showing 500 error instead of 404 for missing device (closes #194)
  • Fix for "Server Component" error when logging in with invalid credentials (closes #190)

What's Changed

  • Auth bug fixes by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/195
  • Custom terminal by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/192

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.4.2...v5.5.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.6.0
entry.content:
NEW

You can now see all of your devices in one place on the root page and select "Details" for more info about that device.

What's Changed

  • Package updates and log cleanup by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/196
  • Multi view by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/199
  • Package Updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.5.0...v5.6.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Package updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/204
  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/208
  • More unit tests by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/209
  • Sonarqube fixes by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/210
  • Fix when device is unplugged by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/212
  • Update TailwindCSS by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/216

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.6.0...v5.6.1
